We have been greaten by the owner and we had a great time throughout the whole …

Name: Grill Room Marmara
Review Text: I ordered lamb soup according to host recomendation and it was delicious. Also lamb chops and lamb ribs were ordered and both were tender and delicious. Also the potato that came with main course was unique looking and delicious and same …

Name: Grill Room Marmara
Review Text: Good food, good service. Our server worked hard to accommodate our demanding party (vegans, gluten-free, etc) -- in English, no less. Very nice people, tasty food.

Name: Grill Room Marmara
Review Text: Dr. Pieper was closed, so we went to Marmara - lucky us! We´ve had the dish of the day, which was patlican kebap and had also kiymali pide (pide with ground meat). It was all delicious.The meal came with different sauces, salad and rice. This was the best place to eat during my Amsterdam trip. Thumbs up and thank you!

Name: Grill Room Marmara
Review Text: Finest real Turkish food in town. Charcoal grill with amazing different kebebs, great sauces and superfresh turkish bread. Must watch out not to eat here too often!

Name: Grill Room Marmara
Review Text: Fresh food. More value for money than expected. Bring friends & family to share the dishes. Great location to relax with a complete meal.

Name: Grill Room Marmara
Review Text: Excellent food. Sumptuous portions. Excellent host. Perfect service. Can go there everyday. Enjoyed the experience.

Name: Grill Room Marmara
Review Text: The dish of the day is always nice, our go to solution for a late evening dinner. Also, amazing staff and great lentil soup!

Name: Grill Room Marmara
Review Text: Very nice restaurant. We feel a familiary atmosphere, in a cosy place with a delicious food with great prices. A great experience!

Name: Grill Room Marmara
Review Text: Excellent quality Turkish food. Staff are warm and friendly and the place is clean.

Name: Grill Room Marmara
Review Text:

However, the items from the grill tasted of charcoal and benzene
